Row.Text: All buildings gain a +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] adjacency for Navigable Rivers.

[BLIST][LI]All Buildings receive a [B]+1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Adjacency[/B] for [B]Navigable Rivers[/B].[LI][B]+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Temple of Amun[/B].[/LIST]
+30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being the Nubia's associated Wonder.
